tool_description: Ulvis.net offers a powerful API to interact with other sites.
name: free url shortener
title: free url shortener

api_list.description: shorten url  url= url-wan't shorten &custom= your custom name& private= if wan't be public them 0 if private them 1http://ulvis.net/api/write/post

optional_parameters.name: via
optional_parameters.description: Adds a signature to track your application

optional_parameters.name: uses
optional_parameters.description: Number of uses for the url
